description: Interact with the Nile database platform through a standardized interface. Manage databases, execute SQL queries, and handle credentials seamlessly. Enhance your LLM applications with powerful database capabilities.

capabilities.name: list-resources
capabilities.description: Lists all tables and their descriptions in the specified database

capabilities.name: list-databases
capabilities.description: Lists all databases in the workspace

capabilities.name: get-database
capabilities.description: Gets details of a specific database

capabilities.name: get-connection-string
capabilities.description: Gets a PostgreSQL connection string with fresh credentials

capabilities.name: execute-sql
capabilities.description: Executes a SQL query on a Nile database

capabilities.name: create-tenant
capabilities.description: Creates a new tenant in the specified database

capabilities.name: delete-tenant
capabilities.description: Deletes a tenant from the specified database

capabilities.name: list-tenants
capabilities.description: Lists all tenants in the specified database

capabilities.name: read-resource
capabilities.description: Gets detailed schema information for a specific table
